message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $120. It's a really great deal for a product you'll value at $150.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can offer $115 for the product.
